attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I thought it was going to be a child friendly app but when I opened it I saw this creepy looking man and I think someone hacked it. I was watching it with my gecko and when he saw it he screamed. Would not recommend

attributes.title: Disappointed but not surprised.
attributes.review: the visuals were lacking. there was NO option for another language ONLY english, at least try to be exclusive??? got boring after 2 seconds. i hated the app.

attributes.title: What even???
attributes.review: I opened the app and it just didn't work!! I tried re-installing it, turning off my data, going through data AND wifi, but nothing worked!? Fix this app or remove it.

attributes.title: this app made me blind
attributes.review: Upon opening this app I was bombarded with a Donald trump photo which ended up causing my blindness. Do NOT install this app. Not only did I go blind I lost brain cells and almost got a heart attack. This deserves a 0 star. Thank you you have been warned.

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: This app has to many glitches in the system and doesn’t allow me to read events and other items

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app is the absolute worst app i’ve ever gotten. i’ve had games that take hours to load and they are faster than this app. DO NOT GET IT. you will regret it and it will make you very agitated. it’s takes hours to even download.

attributes.title: donald trump🤢🤮
attributes.review: omg i downloaded the app... AND IT GAVE ME HEAD LICE😡 after 2 days of having the app i was attacked by trump ninjas and they held be down and spray tanned me till i was orange😡 they continue to hang trump stuff up around my house ad killed my pet cockroach...😭R.I.P lil huddy😭it’s been a week since and i’m still orange.

attributes.title: Worst app EVER
attributes.review: This the most horrible app I have ever downloaded!! It took almost 13 hours to download it also gave my email to a spam company and I have been receiving tons of spam email!! I couldn’t be more ashamed of such a app 🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible App!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It keeps crashing whenever I use it and will never load correctly. On top of that, the news and events are uninformed and are never correct.

attributes.title: not satisfied
attributes.review: This app is the worst app i've ever downloaded. I regret the second I opened the app i had to delete it so fast, I, and many others,  do NOT recommend anyone getting thing on their phone it is like installing a VIRUS. 🙄🙄🙄🙄
